### There should be at least ten students per school. Schools with fewer observations are excluded from the analysis. The variable nb.stud informs about the number of stundets per school and save final data set, 6489 students

```{r  eval = FALSE}
tab.id <- table(pisa18$school.id)

pisa18$nb.stud <- nb.stud
rm(tab.id,id.frame,nb.stud)

pisa18 <- pisa.data

summary(pisa18$nb.stud)
```

### Stack models: Use all relevant predictors, hold out some to check for predictive validity


```{r  eval = FALSE}


# models to stack
# theoretical model
stack1 <- as.formula(attp ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + (1 | school.id))
# composition effect
stack2 <- as.formula(attp ~  immig + native + female + escs  + RUR + DISH 
                     + GYM + STAFFSHORT + EDUSHORT + FEMFRAC + SN_SC + NN_SC + (1 | school.id))

models <- vector(mode = "list", length = 2)

models[[1]] <- stack1
models[[2]] <- stack2

```
##### fit model

```{r  eval = FALSE}
a.seed <- 12345 
a.iter <-  2000 
a.chains <- 4  

#pisa18$WITHOUT  <- as.numeric(pisa18$FAILED >= 0.02) # above median

fits0 <- list()

fits0[[1]] <- stan_glmer(models[[1]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 0,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 

fits0[[2]] <- stan_glmer(models[[2]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 0,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 

fits1 <- list()

fits1[[1]] <- stan_glmer(models[[1]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 1,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 

fits1[[2]] <- stan_glmer(models[[2]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 1,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 


save(fits0, file = file.path(PPath,"Files/fits0.RData"))
save(fits1, file = file.path(PPath,"Files/fits1.RData"))
```

#### improve theoretical model
```{r  eval = FALSE}


# theoretical model, immig
imp1 <- as.formula(immig ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + (1 | school.id))
# theoretical model, native
imp2 <- as.formula(native ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + (1 | school.id))

# theoretical model, native
imp3 <- as.formula(NN_SC ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + (1 | school.id))

models.imp <- vector(mode = "list", length = 3)

models.imp[[1]] <- imp1
models.imp[[2]] <- imp2
models.imp[[3]] <- imp3

```
##### Fit new models

```{r  eval = FALSE}
fits.imp0 <- vector(mode = "list", length = 3)
a.seed <- 12345 
a.iter <-  2000 
a.chains <- 4  

fits.imp0[[1]] <- stan_glmer(models.imp[[1]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 0,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 

fits.imp0[[2]] <- stan_glmer(models.imp[[2]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 0,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial()) 

fits.imp0[[3]] <- stan_glmer(models.imp[[3]], data = pisa18[pisa18$WITHOUT == 0,], seed = a.seed,
                      iter = a.iter, chains = a.chains, family = binomial())


save(fits.imp0, file = file.path(PPath,"Files/fits.imp0.RData"))


#load(file.path(PPath,"Files/fits.imp0.RData"))

```
#### ld and fewbooks are very important, moreover aca, bul and uni
```{r}
# theoretical model, immig
imp_post1 <- as.formula(attp ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + ld:fewbooks + uni:aca + goal:ld +(1 + fewbooks| school.id))

imp_post2 <- as.formula(attp ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + belong +  joyread + goal + mot  + DISCIPLINE + TEACHBAD + VAL + ld:uni + fewbooks:aca + belong:fewbooks +(1 + ld| school.id))

knots <- quantile(pisa18$goal, p = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75))
imp_post3 <- as.formula(attp ~ aca + ld + uni  + bull + fewbooks + joyread +  mot  +  bs(goal, knots = knots) + (1 | school.id))

models.imp_post <- vector(mode = "list", length = 2)

models.imp_post[[1]] <- imp_post1
models.imp_post[[2]] <- imp_post2
models.imp_post[[3]] <- imp_post3
```
